displayProperties.description: 🦘 [REDACTED]
不使用氣閘室清除複製BUFF
🦘 During the Oracles encounter, no Guardian may shoot the same oracle. Rotate positions.
完成神聖心靈遭遇戰而沒有在BOSS Harpy面前殺死任何壹只獨眼巨人. 而在其他區域中的獨眼巨人, 可在最後沖刺的時候被殺死.
During the Consecrated Mind encounter, all players must refresh their Enlightened buff at approximately the same time. However, the team may be split up at different tethers.
秋露·知追逐關: 守護者們不能受到秋露·知的電能爆發的傷害.
保險庫關: 騎士必須在刷新的房間內被擊殺.
🦘 During the Atheon encounter, each Guardian may only destroy one Oracle per set. As such, the Aegis wielder will need to partake.
🦘 During the Dominion encounter, the primary crux may only be destroyed once per glyphs phase.
🦘 Throughout the Exhibition encounter, each Guardian may only defeat one Disciple's Hourglass. Choose one to skip.
擊殺成聖心智階段每次都必須存入 10 個熒光
🦘 For the duration of the Acquisition encounter, each wave of [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions must be defeated within 5 seconds of one another or not at all.
🦘 During the Templar encounter, prevent the Templar from teleporting at all costs.
卡麗關: 凈化全部九個臺子, 擊殺所有九個騎士, 並且在輸出卡麗之前擊殺所有巨魔.
🦘 During the confluxes encounter, destroy Wyverns only while they're sacrificing against a conflux.
🦘 During the Gatekeeper encounter, destroy the Praetorian Minotaur and Wyvern simultaneously.
🦘 [REDACTED]
🦘 During the Caretaker encounter, only one symbol energy charge may be carried at a time per Guardian.
摩格斯關: 不要擊殺小巨魔, 只殺大格格.
瑞文關: 守護者們不能射擊同壹只眼兩次.
🦘 [REDACTED]
During the Sanctified Mind encounter, bank 30 motes at each Vex relay. At each relay, all 30 motes must be deposited within 10 seconds of one another.
